directions: Combine shrimp, pasta, cucumber, tomato, olives, onion and dill in medium bowl. Whisk mayonnaise and vinegar to blend in small bowl. Add dressing to salad and toss to coat. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour an up to 2 hours.
ingredients: 4 ounces small pasta shells, freshly cooked
1/4 cup chopped fresh dill or 1 tablespoon dried dillweed
title: Shrimp Pasta Salad
